ygData.subject: how to start
ygData.msgSnippet: I want to get started on black smithing, my guild master offer me the skill to be trained. can someone tell me how to start up? I have around 70 plat to spend
ygData.messageBody:
I want to get started on black smithing, my guild master offer me the skill to
be trained. can someone tell me how to start up?

I have around 70 plat to spend on this, is this enough ? Can black smithy make
plate mail armor yet ?

what lvl do i need to make banded ? I read the black smithy books, but i don't
know which ITEM increase my skill the fastest and best money saver. Thanks for
all ur help.

Richard Yu - IBM
